name: The Empty Cone
description:
Your ice cream parlor, The Empty Cone, is at risk of shutting down! Due to the unfortunately frequent monster visits, The Empty Cone is on the brink of financial collapse. Can you keep the parlor alive?

Serve customers ice cream as rapidly as you can while hiring employees, purchasing upgrades, and, well… fending off monsters every once in a while.

Controls:

WASD to move your character. Other controls are explained in-game.
